items.content_html: A front-end javascript library allowing developers to easily create interactive components anywhere on their webpage. Currently, you can mount questions and score panels on your page using the pre-built components. You may also extend the library and use it as a "lightweight" React.
items.title: lanyanxiang/interactive-blocks: A front-end javascript library allowing developers to easily create interactive components anywhere on their webpage. Currently, you can mount questions and score panels on your page using the pre-built components. You may also extend the library and use it as a "lightweight" React.
